title: Definitions
context: [ยง353H-2] Definitions. When used in this chapter: &ldquo;Community-based long-term support programs&rdquo; include programs administered and operated by community agencies, faith-based organizations, and other entities offering support to offenders for at least one year. &ldquo;Community-based programs&rdquo; are programs that are administered and operated outside of a correctional facility. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of public safety. &ldquo;Institution-based programs&rdquo; are services offered within a correctional facility. &ldquo;Reentry programs&rdquo; include programs that are located within a correctional facility. &ldquo;Reintegration programs&rdquo; include programs that are located within a correctional facility. &ldquo;Transition programs&rdquo; include programs that are located within a correctional facility. [L Sp 2007, c 8, pt of ยง2]
